subsection_content: Are not! Roundworm disease is not transmitted directly from person to person. An estimated 807 million – 1.2 billion people around the world are infected with Ascaris lumbricoides (sometimes just called roundworm or ringworm). People are infected with roundworms by contact with soil mixed with human or animal feces containing roundworm eggs or contaminated water or food sources.
subsection_title: benh giun dua.json. Are roundworms contagious?
subsection_data:
benh giun dua.json. Are roundworms contagious?
Are not! Roundworm disease is not transmitted directly from person to person. An estimated 807 million – 1.2 billion people around the world are infected with Ascaris lumbricoides (sometimes just called roundworm or ringworm). People are infected with roundworms by contact with soil mixed with human or animal feces containing roundworm eggs or contaminated water or food sources.
